website_summaries.verdict: Heavy-duty and absorbent, this cotton mat is thick, soft, and easy to clean.
pros: This is a high-quality mat with an attractive appearance and nice size
Users feel it is safe and doesn't slip even without rubber backing
Many appreciated the lack of rubber, which makes it easier to wash
cons: A few customers received mats with an uneven weave
A few said it doesn't stay in place as well as rubber-backed versions

customer_reviews.title: I really like the size too because many bath mats are too ...
customer_reviews.text: These rugs were some of the cheapest I've seen, but not for lack of quality. They are heavy duty and absorbent. I really like the size too because many bath mats are too small. And usually I buy new ones often because they begin to get dirty but these are completely machine washable. If you are worried about slipping because of the lack of a rubber bottom..don't! From all I've used them they don't slip from normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa White

customer_reviews.title: Love these! We previously tried all types of rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! We previously tried all types of rubber backed, memory foam, shag, etc. floor mats in our bathroom. The main issues with all of them was that they stayed wet a long time and they were difficult to wash - so it didn't happen too often. In addition, when we did wash them, they tended to break down pretty fast. These towels are basically like the ones you find in every hotel. They are thick enough to keep your feet warm when you step out of the shower and soak up the dripping water. They also wash up great with weekly laundry. Having two, we just rotate a fresh one every week when it's laundry time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because there were so many good reviews but these mats are more like hand towels
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because there were so many good reviews but these mats are more like hand towels. They are thin and there is no rubber-like bottom to keep the mats in place so they slide around and bunch up. I went to Target and bought a mat that is so thick and cushy that when you step on it, it feels nice and plump and your feet sink right in. And it stays in place since there is rubber on the bottom. These ones, I'm literally gonna use them as hand towels cuz no one will no the difference. Go buy yourself a quality bath mat if you care about quality. The 1 star is for absorbency.
customer_reviews.author: Quyen Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Impressive High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m very, very happy with the quality of this item. In fact, it’s still difficult to believe that textiles of this quality are so reasonably priced. When I first placed this on the floor of my bathroom and then used it for its intended purpose, I nearly passed out, I was so overwhelmed by the quality. It’s a good thing the floor wasn’t slippery, or I may have been injured. The irony isn’t lost on me. These are not just any bath mats. They may even save your life! Can you afford to go another day without them? What about your children?
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I like using towel-type bath mats because I wash them frequently, and rubber-backed mats take forever to dry after washing. These mats are very nice quality, thick and soft underfoot. We have a ceramic tile floor in our bathroom, and we haven't had any problems with these mats slipping. I bought the sage green mats, and the color is very attractive. The mats are a bit larger than I expected them to be, but not so larger that they take up a lot of space in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: This is what im talking about!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO happy i found these. I was of the impression theh didnt make these anymore. All i could ever find in the stores were the rugs that are filled with foam and get soaked through and mold and mildew in on the under side, and fall apart in the wash. This is just a towel you put on the floor and you pick up when you're done and hang it to dry, and when wash it, it remains intact. I am so happy i found this, words just cant describe. I already have more in my cart!
customer_reviews.author: Hakudoushinumber9

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: These 100% cotton bath mats are thick and made really well. Using these bath mats (vs. synthetic bath rugs) are better for the environment because they require less water and energy to launder. They take less space in the washer and dryer machine, and can be air dried to save energy, too. Sure, they're not fluffy like microfiber or polyester rugs, but these cotton mats never get matted down and gross either. I will never buy synthetic rugs or bath mats again.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: This item is not luxuries and is a slip hazard!
customer_reviews.text: This item is not as thick as I was lead to believe. I would not consider this to be luxurious at all. When I first opened the box I was wondering if Amazon had sent me thin cheap towels in bright purple!! I had read reviews that had said that the cotton back hugged the floor. NOT TRUE!! When I put it on the floor, to give it the benefit of the doubt, I walk acrossed it and nearly slipped!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not my best purchase
customer_reviews.text: These feel like rugs at the Best Western or a simlar low-end hotel. They bunch up, they are easy to trip over, and they don't actually absorb much water. I wish I had heeded a simlar review and purchased something with a rubber backing. These have no staying power at all. I thought that would be fine, but it's constantly a problem in my high traffic bathroom. Pros: - Easy to wash - Affordable - Color is as expected - No rubber backing to fall apart in my dryer Cons: - Tripping hazard - Slide all over the floor - Material feels cheap - Not absorbant
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Not bath mats, just cheap towels!
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT bath mats, they are literally just towels. Super slippery towels. They look and feel cheap, the color is off in person. If you like the look of towels thrown on your bathroom floor, this is the perfect product for you.
customer_reviews.author: sorraim

customer_reviews.title: Could have been nice
customer_reviews.text: Ok, well standing on these feels nice, they are thick enough to not just feel like a towel on the floor. However! The craftsmanship on these is garbage. I got white which is a true white....besides the random blue and gold threads that were weaved in?! Literally like as this was being manufactured a single blue thread and a single gold thread fell in and just got weaved into the material. I managed to cut them out so that was good but really the least of my worries because one of mine also has a giant bare spot and a ton of snags. Two stars only because if it weren’t so sloppily made it would be actually nice.
customer_reviews.author: kyle phelps

customer_reviews.title: Best buy on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours researching bath mats before choosing these. What great bath mats! Really quick shipping during the ccp virus! All following comments are after 1st wash. Their color is fantastic and fast. They are extremely thick and soft. After wash they measure 21 1/4” x 33 3/4” and all seems are also intact. Am expecting they will hold up over time. Good price too! I could not be happier, love’m !
customer_reviews.author: Greywolf

customer_reviews.title: Good Weight and Absorbent - Excess Dye, Though
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace bath rugs because they're easier wash. They are of a decent weight and seem to be pretty absorbent. A few issues though - first, they do take quite a while to dry in the dryer, which is not a big deal. Second, there is excess dye when I ring them out, especially the black ones. Make sure to wash them with like colors. I'm hoping this will resolve after washing a few more times. Otherwise, they are nice mats.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Not a towel, made by Utopia Towels
customer_reviews.text: When you first read the description you think it is a towel, no, they are bath mats. They are great, washed, no fade, no lint, but also nothing on bottom so they stay still, color is beautiful, dk. Grey, very nice, maybe you should put rug pad under? Just so you don't slip? I don't think you will, they are heavy, thick and very nice.
customer_reviews.author: ms boop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bath mats
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to replace my old, thick bathmats that were such a bear to wash and dry. I wanted something more like the bath mats I've used at many fine hotels. These are perfect! They are slightly thicker and heavier than a bath towel. I washed them before using as directed. There was a small amount of loose thread pieces that went away after about two washes. The colors have not faded, and the cotton is soft. Perfecto!
customer_reviews.author: Cuzzin Joe

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent and much more economical than regular bath mat/rugs for us. I like to clean the bath mat regularly which wasn’t easy when it was an actual rug. So then we resorted to using old towels to step out of the shower onto, but that just wasn’t very nice looking. I was worried these would be too small, but they are perfect. I really like the dark grey color too.
customer_reviews.author: SCJC

customer_reviews.title: These are REALLY nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because the memory foam bath mat I was using was not washable and I didn't like continually stepping out of the shower onto something that could be housing bacteria! I pulled them out of the packaging (2 to a bag) and was really surprised to how thick they really are! I washed them because they do kind of smell...but they wash and dry well. Color stays put (no bleeding) and color is true to picture. Thankful that there are 2 in the pack because I can use the other one while the first one is in the laundry! This was a great purchase! Packaging was great and delivery time was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: nancypoo

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Was so disappointed with this product. It's basically a heavy towel like the ones hotels put on the edge of the tube for the floor. Color is true to picture. Size is good. However they don't dry fast at all. Take a shower at 9 am and at 9pm it's still wet. Washed them one time and the fibers became loose. They also don't stay in place and like to bunch up.
customer_reviews.author: Mickelos G.

customer_reviews.title: Gets ruined in washing machine on delicate!
customer_reviews.text: While these towels are such a lovely dark grey and are very soft and thick for using as shower mats I love them BUT first time through the wash on delicate might I add, and threads pulled and pilled and now they just look terrible as if they had been used for years. I am not happy about this at all. The only reason I put one star is because you have to.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyn F.

customer_reviews.title: After a year of using them, one did develop a hole.
customer_reviews.text: I got these floor towels about 1 year ago. They're pretty good. I always wash and dry them per the instructions on the tag. They did shrink a little after the first wash and never lied totally flat after that. But that didn't bother me much. After a year of washing, one of the towels developed a hole. So I guess not bad. Though I do have towels much older that haven't developed any holes. So we'll see how much longer they last.
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Mom Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: These are like the thin bath mat you get at a hotel. It's a bit heavier than a towel weight and it's made to use when you step out of bath or shower. You can hang it up after to dry it and use it a couple times and then launder...the color is exactly as the picture. I use one for my dog food and water bowl as my boxer tends to make a mess and I use one when I step out of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl brown

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I was really let down by all the 5 star reviews. These "bath mats" are literally just towels that slide everywhere like...well putting a towel on the floor. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: riley54

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this type of bath mat and am thrilled not only to have found them, but with the quality of them as well. These mats are super soft and thick. They feel great to stand on and with their great absorbancy, I no longer worry about water getting all over the floor. I love that they can be folded up and draped over the edge of the tub or shower door, and thrown in the wash with our regular towels when needed. You can't beat the price of this set of high quality bath mats. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for what I need. They are like a thick towel. Cushy and absorbent. I washed them separately when they got here because some reviews were complaining about the lint getting on their other items when they washed them. There was barely anything in my lint trap when I emptied it, but I would rather be safe than sorry. Next time I will just throw them in with the rest of my towels.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D

customer_reviews.title: pretty terrific
customer_reviews.text: I love bath mats and must own three dozen! Love the feel of a thick bath mat on my feet when stepping out of the shower. These are a large, feel great under the feet and appear to be quite absorbent. My only issue is the color is a bit bluer than what shows on its listing. But it's a small issue and certainly doesn't affect its efficacy. Great buy, great price.
customer_reviews.author: kathyd

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy unless you love copious amounts of lint and pilling.
customer_reviews.text: Bath mats are nothing more than two thick small cotton towels that shed an incredible amount of lint. I washed and dried them once upon receipt and they created a baseball sized wad of lint in my dryer lint screen. And, they were covered with pulling after washing and drying. I immediately returned them. Very poor quality product, made in Pakistan.
customer_reviews.author: robert light

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used cotton bath mats for many years. These mats are like a very thick towel and are similar to those used in luxury hotels. They are soft and very absorbent but best of all they are easy to care for. I have not had any issues with them sliding around on the ceramic tile in my bathroom. Rubber backed mats deteriorate quickly with frequent washing and drying. These mats are beautiful and unchanged washing after washing. I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Very Sanitary
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for purposes intended. I like to have an additional bath towel to place over the everyday bathroom rug when getting out of the shower. These towels fit the bill. My freshly cleaned feet step onto a clean towel—no germs. The towel absorbs water and after a couple of uses, I can toss it in the wash with a little bleach and use the second towel. Very pleased with my purchase😃
customer_reviews.author: Radmichime02

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Nice
customer_reviews.text: At first I was hesitant to buy these and when they came in, I was bummed that they didn’t have rubber backing for non slip like my other mats. These are actually much better. My old mats had the nonslip rubber and that ended up disintegrating in the washing machine and fuzz and rubber were everywhere. These don’t move much and are so much easier and less bulky to clean. I like the color and I feel like the quality is really good and the water doesn’t really soak through the mat. They are simple, easy to clean, and make me feel more adult than I actually am.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: A+ so far!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of these towels. Mostly use them to step onto when getting out of the shower and they’re great for that, they’re thicker than typical towels and slightly smaller, so they’re great for that purpose. They’ll shrink a bit in the wash, but thats not really an issue for me. They seem to be good quality and the price was great. May order again in the future if I need more. I’d recommend them though, pleased thus far! They also arrived quickly and were packed pretty well so they arrived undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: N. A. Kovic

customer_reviews.title: Just a towel
customer_reviews.text: This is literally a towel... not really a bath “mat”. If you want a specific somewhat thick towel to stand on when you come out of the shower, this is it. There’s no cushion, it’s just towel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I got the 2 bath mats in purple. Theyre a thick towel material with no rubber backing, so really easy to wash and they dry out well after each shower. The color is as shown in the picture and the cotton is soft, nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: ttula

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy, good price, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: We just got a few of these for some of our inn rooms, and so far they make a good first impression! I washed them with water and vinegar and went through a few cycles of drying, rinsing and spinning ( to get rid of lint, which actually really wasn’t bad with these), and they came out very nice and fluffy. We’ll get more once we see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Katja Hawlitschka

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a hotel type towel to place on the floor after showering and this is perfect! Larger than expected, but it does the trick and since there are two, you can have the other one in the bathroom and the other in the wash! Note, that these are towels, so they aren't super thick. I do love that they dry fast!
customer_reviews.author: Nina G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I wanted a bath mat that didn't have a rubber backing, like the ones from nice hotels. I have two young children and I needed a mat I could wash frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: These are basically thick towels like they have to put on the floor in front of the shower in hotel rooms. There is no rubber backing on them at all. They are easy to wash and I hang them over the tub after using and they're dry by the next day. I personally wish they were a little bigger, otherwise they're exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: RedRedtheycallmeRed

customer_reviews.title: Great for purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Works good for its purpose. It is like A hotel floor towel, with a choice of colors, not a rug, as it clearly shows. Which is what I wanted as I have a walk-in shower so it will catch any loose drops then I can hang it to dry after or throw it in the washer and use the other.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Good bathroom put towels for a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: After my previous bath foot tile started to look more dingy then I liked, I ordered this two-pack of towels as a replacement. I have been satisfied with them, thus far. The towels are fairly thick, and they stay in place fairly well when I stepped out of the shower. They absorb plenty of water so I don’t have to worry about dripping on other parts of the floor when I step off of them. They do take a little bit of time to dry out, so I make sure to hang them up after I have used them. You will want to do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: N. BeitlerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love these bath mats!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Utopia Towels Cotton Bath Mats!! They are very thick and soft, well made, easy to wash, dry fast and are very nice looking... I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Barb H

customer_reviews.title: These towels a nicely made but have a flaw that annoys me - ...
customer_reviews.text: These towels a nicely made but have a flaw that annoys me - they don't lie flat on the floor. There is a tightness in the edge seams that causes them to be rumpled no matter what you do. The edges flip or curl up or down on all four of the towels I bought. The thickness, absorbency and washability of the towels is very good though. It just those darn curls and flips you have to get over.
customer_reviews.author: tadance

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: These were very nice. The exceeded my expectations! They are very thick and well made. The previous mat I had was from a department store and I had bought it for twice the price of those two and it was nowhere near as nice. I was hesitant to order them because of some reviews and I'm glad I ignored them. It seems that some people expected a bathroom rug with rubber backing. These are mats that look like a thick towel and that you put on the floor for when you step out of the shower (like hotels have).
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Does not wash well.
customer_reviews.text: The mats are very thin, even thinner than my towels. They do not stay in place on the floor, it really is just like having a towel under your feet. They are not heavy enough to stay in one spot, and there is nothing on the underside to keep it from moving. After one wash the strings started to come out. The only reason I did not give them a one star is because they did not cost a lot of money, so the price is the only positive point. Not ideal if you're looking for something for every day use that you can wash often. Would be good for a camp or something of the sort.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Hoped they would be thinker
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to match the towels I bought from they same company. They match perfectly but they are thinner than I had hoped. They seem to absorb the moisture coming out of the shower but they're not as thick as other Mats I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is basically what I was expecting it to be. It's the equivalent of the bathmats you see at most hotels, but maybe a little more high quality. It has a little softness to it. I was concerned that it might slip and slide around, but on my tile floor it seems to stay in place OK and dries quickly after getting out of the shower. Though I've not washed it yet it seems durable enough. Getting two for the price seemed reasonable. I probably would have preferred a slightly larger size but that's on me.
customer_reviews.author: dmarchell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The towels came more quickly than Amazon originally advertised when I placed my order. They turned out to be exactly what I was looking for. I was tired of our bath mat with a plastic bottom collecting water and bacteria, taking forever to dry, smelling bad, and being difficult to wash. I opted instead for these towels so that I can easily throw them in the wash with the rest of my laundry. The towels are thick, soft, and absorbent. I ordered the dark gray and the actual color matches the pictures. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kozak

customer_reviews.title: Color spots and unraveling after one use
customer_reviews.text: My pair of white mats arrived looking like nice plush large-ish towels: what I expected. But each had spots of color: one red, the other sky blue. Looking closely, I see that there are colored threads woven in in these spots. After one use, one of the mats has several lose threads and loss of texture (flat, non-plush streaks) where they came out - this is before washing.
customer_reviews.author: Surge

customer_reviews.title: Great non-sticky bath mats
customer_reviews.text: Great bath mats. Very absorbent and dry quickly. They’re thick and heavy, but don’t have the rubber bottom some bath mats do and are therefore a breeze to wash regularly. I find they are best used while you are showering and then draped over the edge of the tub afterwards to dry. Since they are white, that also keeps them cleaner. I have used both chlorine bleach and oxiclean on them and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: universick

customer_reviews.title: This is a BATH MAT, not a rug
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and exactly what I needed. Some reviewers seem not to understand the difference between a bath MAT and a bath RUG. This is, as stated in the description, a bath MAT-- a heavy-duty towel intended to be placed on the floor temporarily when one steps out of the tub/shower. I hang mine on the side of the tub to dry between uses, and like other towels, launder periodically. Generous size, absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i was looking for some that were like the mats i already have but from washing over ...
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for some that were like the mats i already have but from washing over the years are beginning to come apart.. these are thick, soft and reversible but are as others described more of a very thick towel.. they work but were not quite what i was looking for, but are priced well and do the job.. not something to leave out all the time, maybe more to use as you take a shower and then throw it in the hamper ..
customer_reviews.author: Vallery  M.

customer_reviews.title: I took a chance on these by purchasing them without knowing they really felt like and I have to say I was pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I'm the type of person that needs to feel towels in the store before buying them. I took a chance on these by purchasing them without knowing they really felt like and I have to say I was pleasantly surprised. The mats are very soft and feel great on your feet. They seem to absorb well and dry fairly quickly. I purchased the 21x34 mats and they are bigger than I pictured, but perfect for my bathroom. Love the dark gray too. Now we will see how well they hold up after a few cycles in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would have went with a different option.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, these mats don’t stay in place and slide around everywhere. Second, they pick up dust and dirt very easily and it’s very visible. The only plus is how easy these are to throw in the wash. Go with a different option.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a review of the Utopia bath towel/mat. These towel/mats are very easy to wash, just like washing a bath towel. This brand is about the same weight as others I have bought in stores over the years, but they have become hard to find in the stores. The quality seems decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Good size, thickness for small storage and for quick wash/dry!
customer_reviews.text: Towels are very absorbent, look good, and wash/dry and store easily in our small apartment. Our building laundry is in the basement. The machines are good but to wash/dry in a reasonable time is important. Also, these towels are more absorbent than thicker ones we’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Egan

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: These towel rugs are prefect! They are much like hotel shower rugs. Very absorbent and dry quickly. I hate stepping onto polyester type rugs where the water just sits on top of the rug. I haven’t washed mine yet, but judging on how quickly they dry I am sure they will wash up great!
customer_reviews.author: Lena Labosky

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of the other type of bath mats that messed up when you washed them or started to hold mildew. These are great. I bought black and they are def black. They are super absorbent and super easy to wash. I've washed them a few time sand they are still a vibrant black color.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase for me ever on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I received these mats but totally disappointed when I washed them for the first time. Both mats pilled and look terrible. It would be a pain to return them.
customer_reviews.author: SNT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my shower area.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. I have low clearance under my shower door and this fits there well, allowing the door to move. I don't like to step out on a rug, I wanted something absorbant and this fits there bill. Very nice quality too, just thick enough to fit and feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah00

customer_reviews.title: Thick and Soft
customer_reviews.text: These are very plush. I would be giving them a five star rating except they started to unravel on the first wash. I clipped the Irish pennant and got no more on the second wash. But, I don't think they will last that long. How long a life can you expect from a bath mat?
customer_reviews.author: charles lozano

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional Towel Bath Matt
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, a towel bath matt, it's great, good quality, rich color (I picked the deep blue), and accessorizes the bathroom well. It's great on your feet when you get out of the tub, or when you are standing in front of the mirror on a cool morning. The only problem I have is that I was looking for a "Real" rug style bath matt and I guess I didn't take the word "Towell" seriously in the description. For a bath towel matt, it's perfect and a great price for two towels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bath mats,
customer_reviews.text: Unlike some of the other reviews I read I've been very pleased with these. I'm not hard on items and I don't wait until they are so dirty that I need to use "heavy duty wash cycle" so perhaps those are these reason that at least for me they are holding up.
customer_reviews.author: KMD

customer_reviews.title: I love these! Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for several months and wash them weekly with my regular towels. I use these to step out onto when getting out of the shower. I love being able to throw them into the wash and feeling like they are really clean. Way better than any step out rug I've used. It was exactly what I was looking for. It reminds me of the ones they use in a nice hotel.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it! Sturdy & long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these floor towels for a year and these top my list as some of my best household purchases on Amazon! I contemplated buying these at first because I was afraid that they might be cheap. I was wrong! They are thick, comfortable, and sturdy. These are perfect for my bathroom floor. I love that I can wash them often and reuse them. Definitely feels like a luxurious floor towel. My happy feet loves stepping out of the shower onto these clean floor towels.
customer_reviews.author: KMH

customer_reviews.title: Purple Mat - Love the color
customer_reviews.text: I really like the plum color it goes well with my room so they get four stars. The mats work perfectly and can be thrown down whenever there's a need. They work well and are pretty absorbant. However, there is one problem, don't wash these overly much. After the 2nd time washing one started to ball up and become frayed as some of the other reviewers have stated. For me though, I specifically needed some plum colored mats that can be washed like a regular towel.
customer_reviews.author: Joe L.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These rugs had an awful odor that got worse with every washing.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Zanasca

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: They are very thick towels however I received the wrong product. Instead of the two floor towels I received one very large towel. I have no use for a giant towel so it is being returned I hope that everyone else has better luck because if you get the right product you will probably be happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: jgmcnair38134

customer_reviews.title: Thick and plush
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers have noted, these are very thick and absorbent. Pleasantly surprised by the high quality at reasonable price. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: batmom23

customer_reviews.title: We'll buy more
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. We've used bath mats like this for decades but they're hard to find now. These are soft, thick enough, and well-stitched. We'll buy more to match other bath sets because the price is right and the quality is top-notch.
customer_reviews.author: Reader from Rice Lake

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These came in a timely manner. However, fresh out of the box, both of them have several thread pulled. Not loose threads from sewing, but looks like the fabric itself was snagged and loops are pulled out and it looks trashy. Not happy. Will be contacting seller to hopefully get a replacement, but for now, 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: WisconsinDuck

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wash and dry.
customer_reviews.text: Good little mat to step on after bath or shower. I didn't want any more thick, hard to wash and dry bath mats. These are great and they wash and dry as easily as towels. They arrive in sets of two and I ordered two different colors.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Matches My Gray Towel Set from Utopia
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 29-year old male in a single bedroom apartment. I purchased this to match "Premium 8 Piece Towel Set (Grey); 2 Bath Towels, 2 Hand Towels and 4 Washcloths - Cotton - Machine Washable, Hotel Quality, Super Soft and Highly Absorbent by Utopia Towels" for my bathroom. Looks nice. Not sure how else to judge this item, so I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great bath mats
customer_reviews.text: I looked through numerous local stores to find this type of bath mat, a think towel-hotel-like mat. I had no luck. I'm so glad I checked Amazon. These are beautiful quality, thick and absorbant bath mats and I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: LMN

customer_reviews.title: Hotel Quality
customer_reviews.text: These bath floor towels/mats are perfect they are soft and have a nice simple style, they are very similar to the bath mats you find in high end hotels, they wash up nicely and at the price point I ordered several packs of two to just switch out while washing a set. 100% cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Michelee

customer_reviews.title: perfect Bath MAT
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching everywhere for these! I just wanted a mat for getting in and out of the shower. Nothing fancy, no slip resistant lining or foam padding blahblah (so if you are looking for those features...this isn't for you). But for those of you that just want a towel to stand on that is smaller than a bath towel but bigger than a hand towel...THIS IS FOR YOU! I have purchased these in Gray and Navy Blue. The colors were as pictured and I have had no issues with their quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bath mat! Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This bath mat is amazing. It’s thick, soft and absorbent. Plus, it dries fast. I’ve been looking for one like this, glad I found one. I hate bath rugs because of it’s backings. This product is similar to what we see in hotel bathrooms, this is not a bath rug. I will be buying more for Christmas presents for in laws and friends!
customer_reviews.author: Dealfinder

customer_reviews.title: Great first impression
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write many reviews but really surprised at how thick these are. I was going to buy from an expensive home store but decided to give this a chance since it was quicker. Feel nicer than hotel bath mats. Hope they hold us just as well. If so I will be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: juliesoutshoppin

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this. After my bathroom reno I switched to these bath mats instead of a bath rug. This absorbs nicely. Only challenge is it takes longer to dry when watching/drying than the other towels I’m cleaning. (it’s dries fine after being used.)
customer_reviews.author: A regular shopper

customer_reviews.title: These are thick towels.
customer_reviews.text: These are thick towels. They are like the ones at a hotel. No rubber backing. Prone to slip. Don’t lay flat. Probably great for single use, like in a hotel. I wanted an actual mat that stays there. I ordered the blue, and while the color is beautiful, the are overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Volleydawn

customer_reviews.title: All I  expected. EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Absorbent. Wash and Dries great. You will have a hard time finding these type bath mats even in Walmart let alone different colors. After trying many different mats over the years these are the most effective.
customer_reviews.author: April Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice,they met my expectations. They are very soft with thick cotton. When you get out of the shower or bath this mat absorbs the water well. I've washed and dried these and it made them fluffier. Plus it's a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look and feel nice, but just do not hold up
customer_reviews.text: It is unfortunate, these mats have started to fall apart after 2 washings. They look and feel nice, but just do not hold up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Super happy!
customer_reviews.text: These mats are nice and thick and very large. Some people have complained that they are nothing more than towels, but they're way thicker than a towel. No latex backing? That's a good thing as the latex just falls apart and they cost more. I am going to take a few minutes and run and extra stitch along the seam on each end for added durability. Over all, I couldn't be more pleased. Great color, great price, and with Prime they were delivered the day after I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Versitile and soft . .
customer_reviews.text: . . . these mats are a nice find. They are soft cotton, absorb water beautifully and fit in any décor. They were a great value and are easy to clean in the wash - there is no rubber backing to weight them down, but the cotton is heavy enough to keep them in place on a tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: kevin burke

customer_reviews.title: Best product. Best price. I love them
customer_reviews.text: I was sort of skeptical to by these mats sight unseen. So glad I took the chance. They are exactly what I hoped they'd be . Absolutely 100% satisfaction. Price is reasonable to. I know because I did a lot of price checking all over the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Girl

customer_reviews.title: arrived dirty
customer_reviews.text: These mats arrived in a sealed wrapper, but when I opened it, both mats were dirty. One looked like someone had wiped their nose on it. Especially in a time of pandemic that really makes me question hygiene/sanitation practices at this company's facility. I'd return them, but can't get to th nearest post office.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Levins Morales

customer_reviews.title: Perfect floor towel
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of these. The threading was tight and they remained so after their first wash. They are soft on your feet after coming out of the shower which feels good. I found them to be very absorbent and able to dry surprisingly quick.
customer_reviews.author: Bongo

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for Relatively Good Quality Towels
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to find these towels on Amazon at this price; hence I was skeptical of the quality when purchasing them (what convinced me was the number of reviews left by other sellers). After receiving the product, I found that although the color was a bit off from what I expected and that they weren't exactly "Extra-Comfy" as described, but the other parts were accurate: Highly Absorbent, Quick Drying.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Yu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fast drying shower rug
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why I couldn’t anything like this in stores. I love this towel rug. We pick it up after showers & it’s dry but the next day. Just throw it in the wash with the towels weekly. It was exactly what I was looking for. I hate bathroom rugs that stay wet & you get your socks wet stepping on them. This solves the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B

customer_reviews.title: They're like heavy towels.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to. They are like small, heavy towels. I've washed them a few times and my only complaint is how quickly they seem to collect debris, and that the corners are curling up. Otherwise, pretty great for the price. Update: 7/28/17 We still use them. I wash them every few days and they haven't started unraveling or anything! They aren't perfect white anymore but i bet they would be if i bleached them. The corners still roll up a bit but otherwise I'm very happy with my purchase. Adding a star for durability and holding up to so many washes.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Allbee

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient for busy bathrooms.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bath mats because they can be washed with a load of towels frequently. I have gone through a lot of bath rugs since we have only one bathroom and it stays busy. Rugs have to be washed separately and don’t last long when frequently washed.
customer_reviews.author: Zac G

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: I use these in vacation rental properties. They are decent quality but I expect to replace them every six months; I do t know if that is a quality issue or if our giests are rough on them. I’ve bought 4 sets per property in the last three years. Recommended if you have realistic expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Keith  W

customer_reviews.title: One broke after 6 uses
customer_reviews.text: I wouldnt have thought they would break so quickly i bought them in November I must have used them like 6 times at most because I have others, but when I pulled one out of the dryer it was broken. Seemed great quality I am surprised
customer_reviews.author: Leonor

customer_reviews.title: THINK NICE HOTEL BATH MAT * * * * *
customer_reviews.text: I was in the hotel industry for 20 years. This is exactly what you are getting. Thicker than a bath towel, easy to wash with your regular towels. THERE IS NOT BACKING on this. Reversible - same on both sides. This is a more functional product than it is "decorative". It just is what it is. It can have disheveled look lying on the floor (just like in your hotel bathroom). All that said I love it - great value, quality product. Should last for many, many washes. I bought the white ones.
customer_reviews.author: KCHILL

customer_reviews.title: Real review, works great, very affordable, soft
customer_reviews.text: These towel mats works great. I used them in my bath and the kids bath, they are super absorbent and soft to step on. I made the switch because I was tired of buying new mats after the dryer demolished the rubber. I highly recommend these if you want to stop using mats
customer_reviews.author: Carol M

customer_reviews.title: Great bath/shower mats
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect - thick and absorbent and just what our feet need as we step out of the shower. Both sides are the same so it doesn't matter which way up you put them. They easily hang out of the way between showers. They are exactly what a classic "bath mat" should be.
customer_reviews.author: fudgefactor

customer_reviews.title: Curls up and doesn’t lay flat after washing. I bought a few. Happened to all of them.
customer_reviews.text: After washing the towel does not lay flat. It curls up on corners. VERY ANNOYING. Also, I always buy white so I can bleach if I need to. Weirdly these didn’t not whiten up. They were dirty from my husband working in the yard and stepping on them before getting in shower. Just yard work dirt. Didn’t come out, even with washing with bleach.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Downing

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: They look exactly liked the picture, excellent price, and they have a thick, luxe quality. I prefer bath mats like these that do not have a rubber backing because you can toss them right in the wash. (I have actually had a hard time finding the non-rubber backed style in the local stores.) I will be purchasing more as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Black

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love these bath mats. The color is great and they are very thick which is a big plus. It's hard to know what you're getting when you purchase something online and I was a bit apprehensive, but these turned out to be a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W.

customer_reviews.title: HIGH quality, srsly!
customer_reviews.text: Here is the best part, "Not made in China." Didn't lose much material from first wash and dry, no color fade. Nice and thick, soft when you step on it, it feels like a carpet. Very pleasant. I highly suggest this Utopia Bath floor mat purchased from Amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: J. Nunn

customer_reviews.title: Probably will go with something thicker (these are thinner than a plush towel) next time and hope for better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Decent - lost quite a bit of color and "lint" when washed for the first time in cold and dried on "air only". Probably will go with something thicker (these are thinner than a plush towel) next time and hope for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Barton Kirch

customer_reviews.title: Great Bath Mat Towels
customer_reviews.text: Bought to protect car seat. Very durable, easy to pull and throw in the wash, and the color matches the flower steering wheel I bought for my car. In fact, my sister being she lives in Florida, loved the whole idea for keeping the seats dry, and I bought a set for her including the steering wheel cover. She also finds the towels to be thick, durable, no fraying, and no color fading.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.C. Karles

product_meta.title: Utopia Towels Cotton Banded Bath Mats, White, [Not a Bathroom Rug], 21 x 34 Inches, 100% Ring Spun Cotton - Highly Absorbent and Machine Washable Shower Bathroom Floor Mat (Pack of 2)
feature_bullets: Made from high quality 100% ring-spun cotton

Experience the touch of luxury as soon as you step out of the shower and onto these bath mats. This can either be at the start of your day or the end, you are sure to enjoy this luxury. You can give your bathroom the touch of a spa with these comfortable and soft bath mats

These are exactly the same as the ones that your feet enjoy at luxury spas and hotels with their 985 GSM, highly absorbent nature along with their lightweight, durable and washable nature. They are amazingly sized at 21 x 34 inches each in order to be able to be stretched across the floor and can be easily folded when not being used

These high-quality and luxurious bath mats come in a variety of 9 different colors including Gray, White, Dark Brown, Champagne, Sage Green, Plum, Black, Electric Blue and Royal Blue so that you can easily match them according to the style and décor of your bathroom. They can be placed in other places as well other than just outside the bathtub or shower area such as next to the sink, any area in the bathroom and any area in the house for that matter. These can also serve as the perfect gift for

These bath mats are fully reversible and have non-rubber backing which makes them quite easy to take care of like washing them along with other mat without causing any sort of harm or damage. These bath mats dry quite fast as well so you can simply wash them with ease without thinking twice

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars9,613 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
